casebody.data:
STATE
v.
HUNDLEY 2018-0901 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 18, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellant's motion for extension of time to transmit the record. Motion granted. The record shall be filed no later than December 24, 2018. No additional motions for extension of time to transmit the record shall be filed in this case.
